welcome.name: Yeison Andrés
welcome.intro: Specialized in Full Stack development with a backend focus using Python, Node.js, and React for complete and efficient solutions.

about_me_text1: As a Full-Stack Developer, I have a solid academic background supported by Academlo in Mexico and a certification as a Software Analysis and Development Technologist granted by SENA in Colombia.
about_me_text1.1: My focus is on creating technological solutions that drive efficiency and growth for your company. With a strong desire to learn and improve my coding skills, I am ready to contribute with innovation, commitment, and dedication to your team.
about_me_text2: As a Full-Stack Developer trained at Academlo (Mexico) and certified as a Software Analysis and Development Technologist by SENA (Colombia).
about_me_text2.1: I focus on creating solutions that drive business efficiency, with a constant commitment to improvement. I bring innovation and dedication to your team.

american school way.name: Course of all English levels A1 -> C1

academlo.name: Full Stack Developer Bootcamp
academlo.institution: ACADEMLO | ACADEMY OF COMPUTER AND INFORMATION SCIENCES

sena.name: Technologist in Software Analysis and Development

full_stack.title: Application Developer – Freelance Project and Internship (Recarga Móvil SAS)
full_stack.description: Since 2023, I collaborated as a freelance developer with the company Recarga Móvil SAS, working on various commissioned software projects without a formal contract. Later, I completed my internship for the Software Analysis and Development technologist program at the same company, finishing in 2025. During this time, I actively participated in the full development of an e-commerce system, handling both the backend and frontend.
full_stack.name: Achievements
logros: Achievement of academic goals during internship

full_stack-work.title: Full Stack Developer – Local Freelance Project (TheraClinic)
full_stack-work.description: Short-term freelance project (2 months) for a medical clinic. I developed a complete management system covering medical appointments, patients, clinical records, and exams. I was responsible for analysis, design, development, and local testing, all tailored to the client’s specific needs.
